login

public boolean login(AuthData auth)
              throws ControllerException,
                     InvalidAuthDataException
Description copied from interface: ControllerFacade
Starts a Session by logging a user in. Checks the given AuthData, if valid, returns a true. If AuthData is invalid returns false.

Specified by:
login in interface ControllerFacade
Parameters:
auth -
Returns:
true if login was successful
Throws:

prepareInsert

public ConnectionAddress prepareInsert(ProtocolId protocolId,
                                       MetaData metaData)
                                throws ControllerException
Description copied from interface: ControllerFacade
Prepares the system for the input of media-data.
After creating a new media-instance with the given metaData,
a proxy is started to serve the coming input request.
The ConnectionAddress of the proxy which will accept the data is returned.

Specified by:
prepareInsert in interface ControllerFacade
Parameters:
metaData -
Returns:
Throws:
ControllerException

                                       OutputOption oo)
                                throws ControllerException
Description copied from interface: ControllerFacade
Prepares the system to output media-data.
The ConnectionAddress of the proxy which will deliver the
requested data is returned.

requestResources

public ResourceRequestIdentifier requestResources(Session s,
                                                  MOIdentifier moid,
                                                  FormatId fId,
                                                  ProtocolId protocolId,
                                                  Action action)
                                           throws ControllerException
Description copied from interface: ControllerFacade
MUST NOT BE CALLED FROM THE CLIENT (is called by the MediaProxy).
Reserves resources for a request. The costs for the request represented by the given parameters are calculated and the ResourceManager is asked to reserve resources. A id for that request is returned to release it later.

Specified by:
requestResources in interface ControllerFacade
Parameters:
s -
moid -
action -
Returns:
Throws:
ControllerException

releaseResource

public void releaseResource(ResourceRequestIdentifier rrId)
                     throws ControllerException
Description copied from interface: ControllerFacade
MUST NOT BE CALLED FROM THE CLIENT (is called by the MediaProxy).
Releases the reserved resources for the given ResourceRequestIdentifier. Frees system resources.

Specified by:
releaseResource in interface ControllerFacade
Parameters:
rrId -
Throws:
